By Wisejay on Saturday, December 23, 2006 - 11:49 pm:

I'd like to see a complete list of the locked monsters and their password triggers. I've looked the both the miscellaneous and shrine sections and have found only a few of the triggers

I got the password for #164 Torridon (Ducken x Special) in a random stray monster battle, at class A the password is "Sun_Bath"

I got the password for #410 Drarin (Suzurin x Special) after three class A tournaments in a row where I won each battle with a knockout the password was "Vampire"
